By Petit-Trot on Wednesday, February 18, 2004 - 06:16 pm:

I know it's scary to go up against me in the first MR4 tourney ever. You're telling yourselves:"I don't want to fight against one of Petit-Trot's monsters, I don't stand a chance!". Let me reassure you, it's only normal to feel that way. You all feel that way. But you have to overcome that fear, BloodLuvinGirl did. Know that once my monster beats your monster senseless, you'll be able to enter in the second bracket, where I won't be. You'll have your chance against other ranchers of your caliber. Until the final bracket that is... So get of your lazy asses and enter some monsters in the LegendCup, only 2 missing for the first bracket.
